name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

news.author: Cate McCurry
news.title: PSNI statement after anti-lockdown protest at Stormont - Belfast Live
news.description: Speaking about the latest Covid-19 figures, Health Minister Robin Swann said: "Today's dashboard figures underline once again the seriousness of the situation we are facing"
news.content:
The PSNI has issued a statement after an anti-lockdown protest today.
Crowds of people protested against the Government's Covid-19 restrictions days after further measures were imposed across Northe… [+1550 chars]

news.author: Sky
news.title: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson urges world to unite against COVID-19 and stop comparing death rates - Sky News
news.description: The PM warns against "a grisly reverse Olympic league table" and taking "morbid comfort in the greater sufferings of others".

news.author: By Luke Andrews For Mailonline
news.title: NHS Covid-19 app 'bug' refuses to let users enter negative test results - Daily Mail
news.description: When users tell the app they have coronavirus symptoms it launches a 14-day self-isolation tracker. But if they don't book tests through it they can't enter a negative result and turn it off.
news.content: More than 60,000 Britons are unable to tell the long-awaited NHS Test and Trace app whether they have tested positive for coronavirus, the Government has admitted in the latest fiasco to engulf the U… [+8319 chars]

news.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
news.title: Coronavirus: NI records highest number of new Covid-19 cases - BBC News
news.description: Northern Ireland's department of health reported one further death and 319 positive cases on Saturday.
news.content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 There have now been 10,542 positive Covid-19 tests in Northern Ireland
NI has recorded its highest daily total for the number of positive Covid-19 tests since t… [+2335 chars]

news.author: Rob Powell
news.title: Coronavirus: MPs to vote on 'rule of six' before government imposes more COVID restrictions - Sky News
news.description: A senior Tory MP tells Sky News he'll be "pressing on" with his move to change the law as "we need debates and votes".
